amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding for Periodic Censuses and Programs by $4 million and increases funding for the Office of Justice Programs State and Local Law Enforcement Assistance funds by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce funding for Periodic Censuses and Programs by $4 million and increase funding for the Office of Justice Programs State and Local Law Enforcement Assistance funds by $4 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lynch amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Lynch.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lynch amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
